name: Gallicum acidum

Head: Pain in back of head and neck
Thick, stringy discharge from nose; photophobia with burning of lids
Respiratory: Pain in lungs; PULMONARY Hemorrhage; excessive expectoration
Much mucus in throat in the morning
Kidneys painful, distress along ureters into bladder
Dull heavy pain in bladder, directly over pubis
Urine loaded with thick, cream-colored mucus
Mind: Wild delirium at night; very restless, jumps out of bed; sweats; is afraid to be alone; is rude and abuses every one

details: Should be remembered as a remedy in PHTHISIS. It checks the morbid secretions, gives tone to the stomach, and increases the appetite. Passive hemorrhages when pulse is feeble and capillaries relaxed, cold skin. Hematuria. Hemophilia. Itching of skin. PYROSIS.
dosage: First trituration and pure acid 2 to 5 grain doses.
